text:
How to (finally) create Linkedin carousels with AI:

1. Go to YouTube.
2. Find an actionable video. Copy the URL.
3. Go to Gemini. The ChatGPT of Google.
4. Paste this prompt → https://lnkd.in/eAGYRNAP.

(it's too long for Linkedin)

5. Go to gamma .app
6. Click "Create with AI"
7. Select "Studio mode beta"
8. Select "Social" → "6 cards" → "Just Vibes"
9. Paste Gemini's answer in the prompt section.
10. Click "Generate outline"
11. Select "AI images" → "nano banana" image model
12. Hit generate and download as a PDF.

It turns any video into a carousel in under 5 mins.

No templates. No Canva. No design degree.
